facial_features.face_shape: soft oval-to-heart hybrid with gentle taper toward the chin
facial_features.cheekbones: high and softly rounded, naturally light-catching

eyes.shape: large almond-shaped eyes with slight upward outer tilt
eyes.expression: calm, confident, serene, inviting, never fearful or surprised

facial_features.nose: refined bridge with softly rounded, slightly upturned tip
facial_features.lips: full, plush lips with defined cupid's bow and hydrated sheen
facial_features.overall: soft goddess beauty with harmonious proportions, gentle feminine features, naturally elegant and photogenic, high-end editorial presence
